text:
Question 174) To save on your monthly water accounts, a family of 10 people want to build a reservoir to store the water captured from the rainfall, which has sufficient capacity to supply the family for 20 days. Each family person consumes daily 0.08 m3 of water.
For the family's objectives to be achieved, the minimum capacity in liters of the reservoir to be built must be
A) 16.
B) 800.
C) 1 600.
D) 8 000.
E) 16 000.
